title: Expanding math skills with the mini-calculator: classroom management
creator_credit: Susan Norton, James M. Smith, Aesop Films and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Offers practical suggestions for integrating calculators into elementary, advanced and remedial mathematics programs and recommends methods of evaluating students’ progress. Suitable for upper secondary and tertiary levels.
